sn55.35:4.1: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, devānaṃ devapadāni avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ pariyodapanāya.
sn55.35:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.35:5.9: Na ca kho panāhaṃ kiñci byābādhemi tasaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā.
sn55.35:5.11: Idaṃ paṭhamaṃ devānaṃ devapadaṃ avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ pariyodapanāya.
sn55.35:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako dhamme … pe …
sn55.35:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.35:7.7: Na kho panāhaṃ kiñci byābādhemi tasaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā.
sn55.35:7.9: Idaṃ catutthaṃ devānaṃ devapadaṃ avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ pariyodapanāya.
sn55.35:7.10: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri devānaṃ devapadāni avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ pariyodapanāyā”ti.
